meanings.sent1: The commencers of the project were excited to get started.
meanings.sent2: She was the commencers of the new club at school.
meanings.sent3: The commencers of the race wore matching t-shirts for good luck.
meanings.sent4: As the commencers of change, they inspired others to take action.
meanings.sent5: The commencers of the play rehearsed diligently to ensure a successful opening night.

meanings.definition: The act of starting or initiating something.
meanings.sent1: His commencers of the meeting set the tone for a productive discussion.
meanings.sent2: The commencers of the event were met with enthusiasm from the attendees.
meanings.sent3: The commencers of the party brought out the confetti cannons for a fun surprise.
meanings.sent4: The commencers of the marathon signaled the beginning of a challenging race.
meanings.sent5: With the commencers of the project underway, everyone pitched in to help.
